name: "Right To Bear Arms" Short Sleeve Tee, Navy
description:
ONLY ONE MEDIUM AVAILABLE!

This short sleeve tee is NAVY in color featuring a two color distressed front design featuring a big ol’ bear head, 13 stars representing the original colonies, the text A.II (Amendment 2) and 1791 (The "right to bear arms" amendment went through several alterations before it was approved on September 21, 1789 and sent to the states for ratification. It became law as the 2nd Amendment with Virginia's vote for ratification on December 15, 1791.)

It also features the 2nd Amendment… 

“A well-regulated Militia, being necessary to the security of a free State, the right of the people to keep and bear Arms, shall not be infringed.”

The back design is a one color tag print distressed look of Resolution Gear’s logo. This is also available in Brown and Black Short Sleeve Tees, Black Long Sleeve Tees and Black Hoodies.  

This is a Unisex, Pre-shrunk 4.5 oz 100% combed ring spun cotton jersey, Tubular construction with shoulder-to-shoulder tape, Double-needle sleeve and bottom hem, crewneck tee. 

*Machine washable and preshrunk to minimize shrinkage. 

*I personally hang all of my tees to dry.

Ladies, order one size down if you prefer a fitted tee.

ONLY ONE MEDIUM AVAILABLE!

name: Official Resolution Gear Soft 3D PVC Morale Patch
description:
RG's PVC Morale Patches measure 2" X 3.25". These are sick!!! PVC allows for a clean detailed look. Details include recessed lines, 2D text and a 3D shooter! They feature hook velcro sewn on the back. Overall matte with very low reflectivity. 

These are available in 4 different color variations. Please click on the different images to see each individual variation. You can then click on image to enlarge!

Image 1 - MULTICAM
Image 2 - DESERT
Image 3 - ACU
Image 4 - BLACK OPS

name: MOPP2 Tee, Silver
description:
This tee by Resolution Gear is a fitted soft cotton short sleeve crew neck tee with an M40A1 Gas Mask and Text Design on the front with a plain back. 100% Cotton, Machine Wash.

Text Includes:

MOPP Levels 1, 2, 3, and 4
Types of Agents - Nerve, Blister, Blood, and Choking
Each Agents Symptoms, Effects, and First Aid.

name: 3/2 Memorial Short Sleeve Tee, Military Green
description:
Ready to Ship! Limited Quantities Available.

There is special care that goes into creating a design of this magnitude. I have said it once and I will say it again… I wish I never had to make one of these designs. As you all have come to know, RG has made Remembering our Fallen a big part of what we do. From our daily Anniversary of our Fallen notes, to these Memorial designs... Never Forgetting and bringing awareness for such sacrifice is our mission. 

Our boys are gone physically, but remain with us in spirit. They will forever be alive in our hearts. We can continue to keep their memories alive by reminding the generations to come of those who selflessly gave their lives for the very freedoms we enjoy. 

"STRENGTH and HONOR"

Lest We Forget! Semper Fidelis!

This 3/2 Memorial short sleeve tee is Military Green in color featuring the 3/2 Emblem on the left chest with an amazing hand sketched Battle Cross and names of the Fallen on the back. This is also available in Black short sleeve tees and Black Hoodies. 

This is a Unisex, Pre-shrunk 4.5 oz 100% combed ring spun cotton jersey, Tubular construction with shoulder-to-shoulder tape, Double-needle sleeve and bottom hem.

'Neither the United States Marine Corps nor any other component of the Department of Defense has approved, endorsed, or authorized this product (or promotion, or service, or activity)'

9oz. 80/20 Ringspun cotton/poly.* Densely knit tight garment face for superior printability. Preshrunk for a long-lasting fit. Set-in sleeves, all-over cover-seamed construction and a full generous fit for comfort. Rib collar and cuffs made with Lycra®. Double-ply self-fabric lined hood.

These hoodies are roomy. I normally wear a Large in anything... I wear this in a Large as well. 

Ladies, order one size down if you prefer a less roomy fit.

'Neither the United States Marine Corps nor any other component of the Department of Defense has approved, endorsed, or authorized this product (or promotion, or service, or activity)'

name: 3D LAR MEMORIAL Tee, Military Green
description:
Ready to Ship! Limited Quantities Available.

A few months ago a Marine asked if Resolution Gear could put together a design that would honor the Fallen Marines of 3rd LAR. There is special care that goes into creating a design of this magnitude. I have said it once and I will say it again… I wish I never had to make one of these designs. As you all have come to know, RG has made Remembering our Fallen a big part of what we do. From our daily Anniversary of our Fallen notes, to these Memorial designs... Never Forgetting and bringing awareness for such sacrifice is our mission. The Marine who approached us served with 3rd LAR and he has been in communication with other Marines from the Unit as well as the Gold Star Families of these Fallen Warriors. The wait over!

Our boys are gone physically, but remain with us in spirit. They will forever be alive in our hearts. We can continue to keep their memories alive by reminding the generations to come of those who selflessly gave their lives for the very freedoms we enjoy. 

"The strength of the pack is the wolf, the strength of the wolf is the pack."

Lest We Forget! Semper Fidelis!

This 3D LAR MEMORIAL short sleeve tee is Military Green in color featuring the 3D LAR Emblem on the left chest with an amazing hand sketched LAV and names of the Fallen on the back. This is also available in Black short sleeve tees and Black Hoodies. 

This is a Unisex, Pre-shrunk 4.5 oz 100% combed ring spun cotton jersey, Tubular construction with shoulder-to-shoulder tape, Double-needle sleeve and bottom hem.

'Neither the United States Marine Corps nor any other component of the Department of Defense has approved, endorsed, or authorized this product (or promotion, or service, or activity)'

name: TTW - HTDead, Black Short Sleeve
description:
This short sleeve tee is Black in color featuring a two color distressed front design featuring General George S. Patton's famous "May God have mercy on my enemies, because I won't." quote. This quote is wrapped around our initials. The back design is a three color distressed look featuring crossed rifles with our signature bloody bayonet tip, an edgy skull and another quote that is not for the faint of heart... TRAMPLE THE WEAK - HURDLE THE DEAD. This is also available in Black Long Sleeve Tees and Black Hoodies.  

This is a Unisex, Pre-shrunk 4.5 oz 100% combed ring spun cotton jersey, Tubular construction with shoulder-to-shoulder tape, Double-needle sleeve and bottom hem, crewneck tee. 

*Machine washable and preshrunk to minimize shrinkage. 

*I personally hang all of my tees to dry.

Ladies, order one size down if you prefer a fitted tee.

name: "DEFENDERS OF THE WORLD", Short Sleeve
description:
We originally offered this in "DEFENDERS OF FREEDOM" (currently available for pre-order) but had a screenprint error. "DEFENDERS OF THE WORLD" is what was screenprinted. We are correcting the orders that were affected. RG is offering the "DEFENDERS OF THE WORLD" at a discounted price.

At the request of some special loved ones of Marines and Sailors deployed with the 15TH MEU, we have put together this design so that everyone can show the pride that they have for their Hero!!! 

Resolution Gear is proud to partner with Operation Help a Hero as we plan to donate a portion of the profits to this fine organization. The monies donated will directly support “Operation Rack Pack’s” for HMM-364 and 3/5! 
To learn more about Operation Help a Hero, please visit their website at www.operationhelpahero.com 

Marines and Sailors, Thank you for your service! Semper Fidelis!

This Short Sleeve tee is Black in color with a front design featuring a Vintage Nautical Compass Rose flanked by two Sea Horses on guard (left chest screenprint location). The full back design features a Vintage styled feel with a statement that could not be more fitting for our Men and Women in uniform… “DEFENDERS OF THE WORLD”. 

This is also available in Military Green Short Sleeve tees and Black Hoodies. 

This is a Unisex, Pre-shrunk 4.5 oz 100% combed ring spun cotton jersey, Tubular construction with shoulder-to-shoulder tape, Double-needle sleeve and bottom hem.

'Neither the United States Marine Corps nor any other component of the Department of Defense has approved, endorsed, or authorized this product (or promotion, or service, or activity)'

name: 2/5 OEF Tee, Military Green
description:
These are available to ship immediately!!!

This 2/5 Operation Enduring Freedome Tee is Military Green in color featuring the full color 2/5 Emblem on the left chest with a 3 color back design. This is also available in Black short sleeve tees.  

4.3 oz 100% Combed Ringspun Cotton. Super-soft, lightweight, crewneck tee. *Machine washable and preshrunk to minimize shrinkage. *I personally hang all of my tees to dry.

Ladies, order one size down if you prefer a fitted tee as this is a unisex tee.

As a former 3/5 Marine, it is an Honor to do this for my fellow Marines! Your support in spreading the word about this special offer to other 2/5 Marines and Families is greatly appreciated. 

'Neither the United States Marine Corps nor any other component of the Department of Defense has approved, endorsed, or authorized this product (or promotion, or service, or activity)'

name: 2/5 UNIT TEE V.1, Military Green
description:
The V.1 "TRAMPLE THE WEAK - HURDLE THE DEAD" short sleeve tee is Military Green in color featuring a greyed out distressed 2/5 Insignia on the front left chest. The back design is an aggressive quote, Crossed Rifles, Skull and Scrolls displaying just a few of the many Battles the Battalion has fought in to include recent campaigns such as IRAQ and AFGHANISTAN. The bloody bayonet tip is RG's signature. This is also available in Black Short Sleeve Tees and Black Hoodies.  

The V.1 is not available in Youth Sizes. Youth Sizes are only available in the V.2 Design (TRAMPLE THE WEAK – HURDLE THE DEAD is excluded). 

This is a Unisex, Pre-shrunk 4.5 oz 100% combed ring spun cotton jersey, Tubular construction with shoulder-to-shoulder tape, Double-needle sleeve and bottom hem, crewneck tee. 

*Machine washable and preshrunk to minimize shrinkage. 

*I personally hang all of my tees to dry.

Ladies, order one size down if you prefer a fitted tee.

name: F'N BOOT, Military Green
description:
This one is for all you F'N BOOTS!!! 

"BOOT" is often referred to as a new Marine reporting to the fleet. Sometimes, it is used by senior Marines to chide junior Marines. Whether you like it or not, unless you are Chesty Puller, you will always be a "BOOT" to someone! 

This tee is Military Green in a 3 color front left chest design featuring the "symbol" used to represent the Infantry and "12/5". No need for me to explain "12/5", you either get it or you don't.  The back is also a 3 color design.

This was originally supposed to have a left and right view of the crossed rifles... during the screen printing process, the art was switched and the result was both rifles having a left view. It is not what was originally offered so we re-screenprinted them. These are the tees that were done incorrectly so we would like to offer them to you for the killer price of $5.00! 

This is a Unisex Short Sleeve Skivvie, Pre-shrunk 4.5 oz 100% combed ring spun cotton jersey, Tubular construction with shoulder-to-shoulder tape, Double-needle sleeve and bottom hem.

As Marines, we may not always be understood for who we are, what we say, the things we do... but, one thing is for sure... We will forever honor our Fallen Brothers-In-Arms. We honor our Fallen and their families. Rest Easy Warriors! Semper Fidelis!
